description.value: One set of junk camouflage can cover 2 bulk worth of items; multiple sets can be combined to cover items of more bulk. It takes 1 minute to apply one set of junk camouflage to a single item but only 1 full action to remove it. An item concealed by junk camouflage always appears to be a 1st-level item worth no more than 50 credits. A character who succeeds at a DC 20 Perception check while looking at the item can tell its true value is being hidden. A person who handles the item and succeeds at a DC 15 Engineering skill check identifies the junk camouflage for what it is.
